title: keevan1
body:
General Keevan: Good to see you
I need people like you
You have what it takes, if what I saw is true
Back on Kerod
Get me 20 zombie kills for now[[stop]]

title: keevan2
body:
General Keevan: You still using that old thing?
Widely outdated
Unfortunately I have not a better weapon
But from those you kill, you can get an different weapon
Upgrade your arsenal[[stop]]
